info.name: Flight Rising: Apparel Search
info.description: If you know the id number of an item, filter to show only it when dressing dragons.
info.additionalInfo:
If you know the id number of an item, filter to show only it when dressing dragons.

To find an item's id, I suggest right click > open image in new tab. Then just copy the very end (after the last / to the .png) 

Paste that in the code, click "Enable" button and go. 

Disable the style when you don't need to search anymore. 

Based on http://userstyles.org/styles/171876
